comment: Here is a legal analysis …lt is unlawful to put someone in fear of bodily harm …. The issue is whether the fear is a reasonable reaction or if the perpetrator is aware of something specific about the victim that would put the person in fear….the kicking and slamming of,property in a rage would certainly put a reasonable person in fear of bodily harm ..especially when the person watching the Tantrum is physically less able to mount a defense as compared to the potential aggression of the enraged person ..tow ways the recording works…depp could argue that it is evidence of failure to mitigate damages ..she could have run away ..amber could argue that the recorded evidence is necessAry to use in the future to act  as a deterrent ..with domestic violence ..the facts and law intertwine in complex ways ….they are both to blame , they should both get to work ..she has hit him ! He admits he is a monster while under the influence ! Both have blame ! Both should be able to,work their craft !!!!

author: Yung KuB

comment:
Anyone in their right mind can clearly see that Amber Heard is annoying and antagonistic. I know her type well. I have dealt with people just like her many times in my life. They constantly annoy you until you can't take it anymore. Then,  They try to act innocent ...like they have done nothing wrong. I am not sure whether it is some sort of personality disorder, immaturity, ignorance, or just some truly dark negativism. 

Either way, I can tell you from experience, that these types of people can push you way past the point of tolerance. It is their sole purpose. Why? I don't know. You can walk away from them, but I guarantee they will follow you and continue pushing you, until you have had enough. If you do end up hitting you, then they run around telling people you hit them, and for no reason. These people are extremely emotionally harmful to others. Especially to someone like Johnny Depp.

One thing I can tell you, is that Johnny Depp is not a wife beater. This video was a deliberate attempt to slander Johnny's good name. As soon as he noticed she was recording him with her phone, he tried to take the phone away from her. Which he had every right to do. 

I am angry that the UK court decided that he was a 'wife beater' without knowing the truth behind that horrid woman's story. I am angry at the producers of movies, who decided to snub Johnny, because if that woman's fabrication. Because of it, I will never watch another sequel to 'Fantastic Beasts".  If Disney also decides they will drop Johnny from further POTC movies, then I will never watch another Disney movie.

Two of Johnny's ex's have even come forward to defend Johnny 'in court'. They attest to the fact that Johnny is not that sort of person. Johnny has always been a very shy and reserved man.  He did not deserve this. I am sorry he ever met and married that awful woman. I feel sorry for anyone that gets involved with her.  It is so sad that there are people like her in this world. Sad, because of the harm they do to other people's lives.


It is obvious she wants to sue him for money. It was probably her plan from the start. It is too bad that some people  cannot see what is right in front of their noses. Of course,  that is probably what Amber Heard hoped for. Shari R
author: * Rain비Cloud America Worldwide

comment: Lies! Complete TRASH reporting! Anything to get views! Right TMZ?? It doesn't matter if you have both sides of the story. Whatever gets people talking, right!? She clearly set this up to provoke him. And after he confronts her, she cuts the video, after she made it appear that he had attacked her, and that they had a violent scuffle. Complete garbage, fake news, taken out of context, one sided Bullsh*t! PATHETIC! These people make me sick with the way they portray these people, and feed off of their pain and personal relationships, to fill their own pockets. He has CHILDREN THAT WATCH TV!! Can you even IMAGINE, how his poor children felt when they saw this, and when they read these reports of their FATHER being portrayed as abusive and as an alcoholic??! Can you even IMAGINE the pain and constant questions from their friends about their father being the perpetrator in something like this? I can't even fathom the pain, torment, and suffering they went through! These are adult issues! A divorce is hard enough for children and families. It's a hundred times worse when you have to see it on TV and the internet because your dad is famous, and not be able to take up for their father, or do anything about it! When Amber heard is singing like a bird, and Johnny and his family, friends, and supporters are completely silent, that should tell you enough about this truth in this situation. She just kept pulling that rope! And now she has hung herself with it! And with all of her lies and abuse! It's usually the silent party that is innocent. The liars can't help but talk to everyone and anyone who will listen. Because they have an agenda. And that agenda is to convince as many people as they can, that they are telling the truth, to make themselves look better, and gain attention, sympathy, and money. But their stories never stay the same, and they eventually get caught in their lies. I'm so glad that Johnny stood up for himself and perused this! Even her own parents were trying to bribe him into not saying anything! And when he wouldn't bite, they turned on him. They KNOW their daughter is an abusive, manipulative, lying, scheming, gold digging who*e! I'm glad the truth is finally coming to the light! Good luck Johnny! I will be praying for you! ♡ sending love!

comment: She truly sounds like she has borderline personality disorder. They manipulate, blame shift, project, fear abandonment and gaslight their victims. (by the way you only need to possess five of the nine characteristic traits to be diagnosed with BPD).  They love to fight so she's trying to provoke an argument out of him also.  What people don't realize that have never been in a relationship with a Cluster B personality disordered individual is that it really isn't as uncommon as you believe.  There are a lot of people like this out there, as I dated a male borderline with narcissistic expression.   Some of them are very good at hiding it in public and they choose to abuse their victims behind closed doors. Those of you that have been in relationships with these people know exactly what I'm talking about. After you've suffered their abuse and you try to move on with your life, you will never be the same. Here you have two famous individuals that are basically now a sounding platform for the rest of the world that can only validate their experiences with these people from YouTube videos, because in the beginning I'm sure Johnny had no idea what he was getting himself into as I know I didn't. They wear a false mask to reel you in, but can only keep that up for so long.  Then they start to devalue you, cheat on you, discard you and then the cycle repeats for as long as you allow it,  or they become so bored with you, they move on and find another victim.

comment: This broadcast represents just about every bit of misunderstanding about domestic abuse that I can think of. Anyone who has suffered domestic abuse - which includes emotional and psychological abuse and coercive control - can see instantly that this domestic violence against her in action. We all recognise the aggressive posturing, the slamming, the tone and the tension of "something physical could happen anytime now." This actually slightly triggered me as the pattern was so very very familiar. She is a brave woman and my heart bleeds for her if she has needed to read the comments doubting her. It's so incredibly traumatic in itself and it's made even worse when you're brave enough to come forward and then you're doubted. One key tactic abusers use is to make you doubt your reality. He was even heard doing that in this video - asking her over and over again about something happening to her that morning, with a question in his voice. Something clearly had happened. It is not calculating to record DA - it is the only way out you have sometimes as abusers are usually incredibly adept at turning the situation around and appearing completely innocent in the presence of third parties. For example, being incredibly calm when police arrive, whilst their victim is possibly crying, angry, seemingly irrational. Inexperienced officers can interpret the situation incorrectly and this regularly happens. As a survivor myself I can say without any doubt that Amber Heard is 100% a victim of domestic abuse.
author: Luca Hugill

comment:
Ok so I was a battered spouse. My ex was an alcoholic. He never drank first thing in the morning, but  if he had the physical abuse would have started before noon. If I had a camera recording him, he would have beat me with it.
I see volatility in Johnny Depp. If he didn't hit her, he definitely emotionally abused her. Alcoholics abuse people, whether they know it or not. If he's drinking first thing in the morning, he's been a drunk a long time. There is no life, life is over, the day he started his mornings getting drunk. 
Alcohol psychosis, black outs, and paranoia, it stems from lack of oxygen to the brain.
This situation is dangerous  whether or not people believe  Amber Heard. There is a possibility she may not have even understood herself.
This man needs help, but unfortunately, at his age it's probably to late. I hope he has someone in is life who cares enough to try, and set him straight.

comment:
There is term for this video in Law, Self-serving, meaning evidence that shows the one party in a good light. In other words the judge would probably disallow this into evidence which is why she leaked it.  He is having a temper tantrum, but he is taking it out on the cupboards and other inanimate property,. It actually hurts her case as the only thing he assaults is the furniture. And he is keeping his distance from her until he sees the camera recording him. and  there was no domestic violence observed. 
I too have a bad temper, I did actually hit a girl I was living with once, but I did so in self defense, I was slamming stuff, she was in another room, I was in the  kitchen. She disappeared  for days,  I came home and found some guy eating a sandwich, she was taking a shower,  I  tossed him out the door. When she came out I said  I had enough of her crap, to get her stuff and go live with the guy. Her reply was to come at me with her 2 ft long swimming trophy, I ducked and it hit my collar bone paralyzing my right arm. I'm a martial arts instructor and reacted by instinct and front kicked her, she went flying into the living room. When she could stand up she grabbed her stuff and left. And of course tried to press charges against me. In emergency it was determined I had a bruised collar bone. I took a bunch of pictures in the emergency and requested a copy of the report, which is the only thing that saved my ass. The judge took about five minuets to glance at reports and tossed it out of court. People lie and embellish facts. In the case of Amber I would say she was doing a lot of embellishing, and touch of lying. .

comment:
She's lying right off....
 JD "Were you here this morning?"
 AH "no"
 JD "Then nothing happened to YOU "
 AH " I just woke up and ...."
 LIE #1
How did she just wake up if she wasn't even there? She was out all night & he just found out millions had been STOLEN from him.
 LIE #2
 AH " We weren't even fighting"
 AH " I said I was sorry"
 Why is she sorry if she didn't do anything?
 LIE #3
 JD "You want to see crazy?"
 JD "All your crazy" YOUR CRAZY OR YOU'RE (YOU ARE CRAZY) 
 What is he responding to?
 When he says " All your crazy" suggesting she's been gaslighting, etc him & he's totally AWARE of what she's doing!!
 Her goading & gaslighting, laughing she cut out. I'm a psychologist & this tape actually SCREAMED to me she's the abuser.
 He doesn't look at her, call her any names, or even face her.
 Anyone who's ever been abused knows this is not what abusers do. They hit you. 
 She alleged she was hit throughout the marriage....why not add false allegations when she stays out all night, comes home with the sunrise, obviously without even checking in (nice way to treat your spouse), & is taping his anger instead of comforting him.

 Am I the only one who actually paid attention to the convo here?
This is why it was dismissed in court. It proves nothing but that she's lying, believe me the Court laughed their butt off at this tape as EVIDENCE.

comment:
I love Johnny as a person. I believe that he's a loving Father, husband, friend, person, it shows. No doubt bec he's humble and kind, generous. In his own interviews, he himself say that "he has different personalities" or he thanks Vanessa for "putting up with him" and a guy as gentle and kind as Johnny, in my opinion can be scary when triggered esp if there are jealousy issues, whether true and esp. false accusations against the other, it is horrific and traumatising for a woman. 

Again, I love Johnny, he's my favorite actor. But in Oprah and Ellen (two of the most genuine people in hollywood,you can tell if a  person is hiding something or let alone phony, he or she will shine through with them, and they can tell themselves that he's not very open or sometimes even jokes which eventually is a lie so they find it hard to talk with him in a deep level) 

It's scary for Amber bec I believe she loved and liked him for who he is. But he is an alcoholic and probably be under the influence of illegal drugs. A guy can be abusive if he can't manage anger the way he broke something in front or near his wife, whether he actually blew up even more after the video or not, he can if he become sane for a second that his wife is exposing him. I believe Johnny can have those tendencies. and putting myself in Amber's shoes, living with someone I love who I found out has abusive tendencies, I WOULD DO THE SAME. I need all the secret footages I can get. I'm a woman, it's scary! Although, I can think Amber is using him or making up stories but I know when a girl is genuine or not, or when a girl is happy with a guy, it shows... 


And it was apparent that she genuinely loved him bec she respects him. Also, Johnny is not hard to love and he's almost perfect no matter what age. If he's who his family says he is,  (which I believe he is ) But those were years ago and they don't know how much he could have changed. But there"s no reason to hate him, use him, or break up with him. He has it all. Looks, personality, talent, ok let's say he's wealthy, and best of all is his charming character! A woman like Amber would want a guy like Johnny so divorcing him let alone suing him wouldn't never be in her list. But! I believe Amber could also make up stories on top of the truth he could easily lie as a false accusation, bec he is a famous and financially astute and well loved guy so he can deny those that will contaminate his good rep and even make up stories...*because he can.* People will believe him. But Amber, I believe have also lied about somethings. I believe they're both scared of their lies being revealed.

comment:
Just going to leave this here - 

puritypersimmona month ago

So to counteract the bias in this article...

Heard's first action after filing for divorce was to send a lawyers letter explicitly stating that she would not seek a TRO or speak publicly about her claims provided Depp agreed to all her financial demands. These included 3 LA condos with Depp continuing to pay all associated costs indefinitely; indefinite spousal support of 50k per month & a Range Rover, again with Depp paying all associated costs. No mention of him agreeing to stay away from her in future, either. When he refused, she pursued her case through the media exactly as she had threatened to do.

LAPD disputed her version of events. They stated that they "saw no evidence that any crime had been committed" & were to testify for Depp had the hearing proceeded. Police audios were also on his evidence list. Depp's security dispute her story & were to testify for him. 5 neighbours/employees at the condo dispute her story & were to testify for Depp.

The pics Heard sold to People magazine were never submitted to court as evidence, therefore never subjected to any meaningful scrutiny. The texts she sold to People were only verified as being uploaded from her phone to her laptop - the recipient of the texts was never verified & the fact that the screenshots had clearly been edited was never addressed.

The video you mention does not show one instance of verbal or physical abuse. Furthermore, in CA it's illegal to record someone without their knowledge & consent. It is very likely that it would have been inadmissible as evidence, which is possibly why Heard sold it to TMZ instead.

Heard avoided 2 court ordered depositions & failed to hand over court ordered documents. Her publicist, whom Depp's lawyers were to call as an adverse witness, declined to be deposed.

Whilst there has never been another suggestion, before or since, that Depp treats women badly, Heard herself was arrested & booked for DV against her former partner Tasya van Ree in 2009. The judge declined to go forward as they were not State residents, but ordered the details to remain on file for 2 years & explicitly told Heard "you're not off the hook" (TMZ has the court audios). After becoming involved with Depp, she applied to have this expunged from public record. When it came to light during the DV case, she sought to minimise/excuse the behaviour by claiming (through van Ree) that the authorities had been "homophobic & misogynistic." In fact, the arresting officer was an out lesbian & equal rights activist who posted on her own social media contradicting Heard's version of events & expressing her anger at being publicly misrepresented.

Heard withdrew all her allegations with prejudice - meaning they can never be re-filed. This is exceptional in DV cases, which are predicated on the assumption of continuing threat. Nevertheless, the judge (who had seen both sets of evidence) signed off on this. It should be noted that if the judge believed there was sufficient evidence to proceed, they could & should have insisted the hearing go ahead even against Heard's own wishes. This is a legal provision designed to protect victims who fear reprisals if they go to court. It should also be noted that it is not possible to settle a DV case.

The settlement refers to the divorce, which had to be negotiated between both sets of lawyers as it was an acrimonious split & there was no prenup in place. Heard was entitled to the money - half of total earnings throughout the marriage, less expenses - regardless of any DV claims.

Part of the (divorce) settlement agreement is that NDAs apply to both Depp & Heard. It is these which Rowling is referring to when she says that she cannot discuss the issue in detail. However, as an intelligent, principled woman, it seems certain that she has informed herself of as many facts as possible & reached her opinions accordingly. Living & working in Hollywood, having knowledge of & access to both parties & their associates, it is absurd to think that Potter fans know more about the case than she does herself. Bearing this in mind, & the above points also, I find it incredibly dispiriting that people seem so unwilling to trust her judgement in the matter. But then again, if they base their opinions on media articles with an agenda driven bias & do not look beyond these for the facts, maybe it's not so surprising. Hey, NME?

I live a fairly sheltered life, so I am just now seeing this,my only question is there any reason she can't leave at this moment,or any moment before or immediately after? 
When people no longer can get along, you need to be able to cut your losses and boogie! In a situation like this, people won't generally feel like talking nice,as long as there is no violence, it is just people expressing raw emotions. Probably 10x worse with"artistic people". Easy to solve that problem, tell em bye, bye.
As far as finger painting your house,  I lived with a young lady for a while,and as the relationship deteriorated she would get angry and want to throw stuff and put a hole or three in the walls, but when I couldn't take it anymore and called the sheriff and they said that since we were both on the mortgage she could do anything she wanted to"her house"it was essentially a civil matter, even though we already had a verbal agreement on how property was to be divided. So don't dally, do not pass Go,do not collect$200 dollars, go directly to your nearest attorney and exercise the demons! comment:
Normally I would take the side of the abused, but honestly, there is way more evidence against Heard's lying than Johnny's abuse. 1) Johnny's two ex wives, including the mother of his children whom he lived with for 11+ years, both say he never was violent or abusive, both described him as gentle. 
2) The texts she allegedly had between his former assistant are on an iPhone. It is the easiest phone to fake texts because 1) there is no number under the name 2) everyone can change a contact name to make it look like they are texting someone else. 
3) This video proves nothing. Johnny was not screaming, was not hitting, was not throwing things - hell, even when he grabbed the camera he wasn't that rough. In fact, the most crazy thing he did in this video was pour wine.
4) Police did not find anything at the scene to indicate any sort of disturbances, Amber heard was photographed hours after the incident at a party, smiling and with no bruises. The photo was later deleted when attention was drawn to it.
Rich or not, celebrity or not, Johnny has way more evidence to back him that he didn't hurt her, psychically. Amber could have easily manipulated, baited, and challenged Depp when he was intoxicated, making him irritable and angry. Women are capable of abuse just as much as men. 
Also, for an IPhone, that video is extremely low quality and could be edited easily, condensed, trimmed, and then sent out - which could explain the low quality.

At 7:08 a... heavy set fellow, starts in on Depp. He made himself sound like a jealous kid in my opinion. But these guys who are putting this video on/up, I guess they need some filler?

And I think he really loved her, because to react like that says he's pretty damned hurt. 
Any of you folks out there ever have your loved one cheat on you and tear your heart out? Well until you have, you really aint got nothin to say, sure you can yak about how a man aint supposed to do that, and yeah, I wholeheartedly agree. But when a guy's convinced his woman's cheated, and if he really really loves her then wow anything can happen. You might not like me very much for saying this, but Billy might want to watch his back, us crazy Canucks, we tend to play for keeps when matters of the heart are concerned, just like you do too.
Peace, and may your loved one never cheat on you, and may you never cheat on them. Keep it sweet and simple and you'll be together always. You just got to make absolutely sure the one you got's the one you want to keep though, because when one is not as connected as the other, they can, and usually do stray.

comment: it is hard to judge a person just by their looks. you never know how the person really is.  my ex boyfriend was a very nice, humble, kind and generous person on the outside.  everyone loved him. EVERYONE. he didn't smoke, drink, gamble,  go out, was always at the library or volunteering. BUT when we were alone, he was a different person.  at home, he was angry, soooooo angry all the time. he would treat me like I was a piece of garbage, and he would be violent with me for no reason. he would force me to endure physical pain, under the excuse that "it only hurts because I am fighting back".  worse two years of my life. when I tried to tell people that he was abusive,  no one believed me. they all thought I was a crazy woman making stuff up. they thought I was bitter and angry, and I was,  but I just thought it was unfair that my abuse was being ignored just because he was such a hypocrit. so people, don't dismiss amber just because Johnny Depp looks like a great guy and everyone says he is that way. violence sometimes comes out under unique circumstances.  my ex boyfriend was never violent with anyone, only with me. only he and I know what happened, and to this day, it kills me that no one believed me.

comment: I don't think it is right that comments are being made and judgements assigned when we are not getting to see the un-edited version. He has admitted to having drug and alcohol issues when dealing with stress, he has said he has a bad temper (breaking things, not people) and really more self harm than anything. He also just lost his mother. I will say this having gone through it... the first year of losing a parent you are very close with, is the most difficult. Grief is a strange thing, one moment you're crushed, then mad as hell. You do not goad or push someone when they are grieving and certainly not when you can see that they are in an agitated state. She could have left the room, the house or him at the the first sight of this behavior. Let's be clear here she is not some uneducated poor women with no means to escape! I believe he has a temper, I believe he has substance abuse issues, I believe he has issues with the violence and instability of his childhood although he said he is fine with it, growing up in that environment shapes you...period. But hey Amber in case you never learned this simple thing, you don't poke a tiger or kick a sleeping dog or goad a grieving human. Many people spout off that they would love fame but I would imagine that the reality of it is very different than most people believe. End rant.

comment:
In spite of how Ms. Heard may have arranged this recording, it is obvious that once Mr. Depp sees he is being recorded, his anger escalates.  His behavior is his responsibility and his behavior is not pretty and I would imagine he would not want anyone (except for Ms. Heard) to see that.  Although he is not throwing punches or slaps, this IS abusive behavior.  And for those of us who have lived with anyone repeatedly showing this type of behavior, we very well know how harmful it can be.  No one should have to be afraid to live in their own home; a place where peace and sanctuary is paramount.
Often people are hurt (however unintentional) by broken glass or flying objects … this is being placed in harm’s way and must not be tolerated.  I am a Johnny Depp fan for his acting abilities; however, it does him no favor to ignore or deny that he is in trouble … if he is truly loved both publicly and privately, he must be called on his behavior.

comment:
December Leigh**** FINALLY!  Thank-you!! So well written and accurate, as with my little Rant I too concur with you. I am not one who follows this gossiping crap nor do I endorse or condone it by purchasing any literature that is published. I came across this sleazy channel by means I can't even explain. With that said your observations are in my belief Accurate. I too can recognize the malicious intent CLEARLY!! She without a doubt knew who she was marrying.  These behaviors that she seems to be so surprised about now, were known to her long before the marital vows. Mr Depp is a self confessed  heavy drinker and has admitted to being hot headed at times. She had no illusions as to what she was entering into, where as he, I believe was the one whom was betrayed! Making matters worse by taunting her lover under his nose. WTF???  AND where were her friend's and Parents? Were  they not around to advise her? If it came to my knowledge that one of my children  or friends were being exposed to DV, I would advise them to QUIETLY!! seek out a battered woman's shelter. I say this not because she is in need of housing but, the people that operate these places are the real  experts!  They are exposed to so many different levels of DV daily and can recognize even the unseen signs. They are more accurate than the E. R. Dept. and the P.D. Going to a shelter first and seeking out advise and alternatives without putting herself  and any others in danger would sound more creditable and more likely the behavior of a scared battered woman. In comparison to how she handled it. That is not the behavior of a woman that is frightened PERIOD! Regardless of battered woman's syndrome or no one will believe me victim crap... It just does not resonate with me.. So, With prejudice and no proof  I believe she was advised by "others" who had self interests in her receiving money) to antagonize and prod him when he is under the influence of any substance ( and indulges herself too) and film him.  She has first hand knowledge of specific behaviors he is going to display when poked at. How perfect? Ka- Ching.......!!! It is sad and makes me angry that all he risked and gave to her INCLUDING A MARRIAGE VOW he is still a middle-aged man that has yet to truly be loved by just one woman for only himself. As I mentioned in my previous comment all the others in his immediate family are at risk and exposed to public chastise because of this public display of BULLSHIT😥😥😥!!!   FYI In response to the borage of comments Soon to come about "this is why women are never justified,because of your comments"  yada yada. To you I say STOP LYING!!!   STOP BEING VINDICTIVE!!!!  STOP THE ENVIOUS BEHAVIORS (boring...) GROW UP!!!   AND  STOP MAKING US GOOD WOMEN WHO DESERVE A GOOD MAN LOOK BAD, LIKE YOU!!!!😎. Once again and at a final word, I wish him and his family much love and success. 
Only by the grace of thee I go.😇

author: Tammy x

comment:
Stuff that is seen in this video happens all the time. He said "Nothing happened to you this morning" maybe something happened to him that morning that ticked him off. He is a grown man and entitled to drink if he wants to. Nothing was thrown at Amber. She took advantage of a situation to cash in. Last I checked it is illegal to do what she did. I thought that she would have to have his consent. She was the one that taped the video and now it's out, but she says she had nothing to do with it. I call bullshit. She is doing this to hurt his career and make him look like the bad guy in the public eye. 

As far as him cutting off his finger. That was an accident and it didn't happen to Amber. And again nobody knows what happened during that argument either to make Johnny Depp go off the way he did. What if they were already in an argument and she said something to him to make him believe that something happened. If a person is madly in love with another person and they hear some crap like that, most of the time they will flip out.

And lets not forget about how Amber had abuse charges thrown at her shortly after her and Johnny parted ways by Amber's girlfriend. Most of the time when someone accuses someone else of cheating on them it's usually because they are the cheater. I would think that would work with claiming someone is so abusive as well. 

Why is it that before all of this the only things that Johnny was known for that was bad was whimsical things like trashing a hotel room and saying that it was an armadillo? Now he is painted as an abusive piece of shit? Usually as a person gets older they chill out a bit. They don't pick up new hobbies like wife beating. Last I checked slamming your kitchen cabinets and throwing a bottle is not a crime, cursing is not a crime, and neither is being pissed off. She thinks this might help her case in some way. But the only thing it helped was to show the world what a manipulative heartless bitch she is. She is only worth 9 million dollars and wants a piece of Johnny's 350 million dollars. That's all that is. Why else would she be trying to date Elon Musk? I don't think it's because of his winning personality or his good looks, it's because he is worth billions of dollars. He is just her next big payday.
